Name: M 182 - Mitchell Katz, Board of Health.
Title: RESOLUTION DISAPPROVING THE REAPPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF MITCHELL KATZ AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY BOARD OF HEALTH.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text:
RESOLVED, Pursuant to Section 31 of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby disapproves the Mayor's nomination of Mitchell Katz to serve as a member of the New York City Board of Health for the remainder of a six-year term expiring on May 31, 2030 [M 182-2025].

COUPLED ON GO
